articles.title: New Trump plan offers UT funding benefits with conditions on academics - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: The Trump administration named the University of Texas as one of nine schools that can access funding benefits in exchange for demands outlined in a compact.

articles.author: James Hibberd
articles.title: Dave Chappelle Criticizes Free Speech in America at Saudi Arabia Comedy Festival - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: "It’s easier to talk here than it is in America," the comedian told an audience at the Riyadh Comedy Festival.
articles.content:
Dave Chappelle criticized the status of free speech in the United States while on stage at the Riyadh Comedy Festival in Saudi Arabia.
